displayName: MySQL - High number of log errors

documentation.content: Log error are a count of logs collected from mysql_error logs with an error level per 5 minute window. The default condition of error per 5 minute window is 5.

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query:
fetch gce_instance
| metric 'logging.googleapis.com/user/mysql.error.count'
| window 5m 
| condition val() > 5
